item.title: Home
item.description: About Daniel Dewar is a writer and sound designer currently working at global data & analytics agency, Datalicious. After working as a freelance record and mix engineer while completing a Bachelor of Sound Engineering, Daniel moved to New York City and worked in film & television as a sound editor and designer, the creative history and work of his peers influencing his sonic and professional choices. Following an opportunity to work as a marketing assistant in New York, Daniel return to Australia working as a digital producer and creative manager before joining Datalicious as their first marketing hire, overseeing its growth from an Australian agency to a global force.
